ygData.subject: Experience penalty??
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen messages talking about the experience hit that we get as bards. Does anyone know what can of percentage we are talking about?  Also, how much more
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen messages talking about the experience hit that we get as bards.
Does anyone know what can of percentage we are talking about? Also, how
much more do we incur if we are chose not to be a human? In other words,
what are the percentage hits for the following:
1) Human Bard
2) Woodelf Bard
3) Human Warrior - just as a comparison (I'm assuming that this race and
class would incur no penalties. So the other items (1 and 2) would be a
percentage increase form this race/class, i.e. A human Bard would require
XX% more experience to level when compared to a human warrior).

Thanks,
Steve
